document_data.name: ''Celebrant's Blade''
document_data.creator: [[Briath Silverhand]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''''celebrant's blade''''' was a unique [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] [[battleaxe]].
document_data.Description: This battleaxe was known to be exquisitely beautiful and one could tell its fine craftsmanship just by looking at it.
document_data.History: The ''celebrant's blade'' was forged by the [[dwarven]] craftsman [[Briath Silverhand]] to celebrate the finished construction of a monument to the [[dwarven pantheon|dwarven god]] [[Moradin]] in the fortress of [[Dorn's Deep]]. He then hid the battleaxe within the monument's stone furnace, with hopes that it would one day be of use to someone seeking to liberate the dwarven fortress from unforeseeable evils.
